page.title: 17Ambergate Station
page.content: Ambergate Railway Station is on the line between Matlock and Derby. The station is not as busy as it used to be. There are 13 services during the week and there are 10 on Saturday and 7 on Sunday. There are extra services at holidays and Christmas, Easter and Summer. There were 25 cars in the car park, meaning possibly people are coming to the station in cars and travelling by train because it is cheaper and much quicker in the rush hour. The trains during the rush hour are at 7.22 and 8.19 in the morning. In the evening time they are 4.21 5.33 and 6.26. The last train at night is 11.41. The trains run at roughly one hour intervals.The train goes to Derby, Duffield, Ambergate, Whatstandwell, Cromford, Belper, Matlock Bath and Matlock.
